landing.hero-subtitle: We will be very happy to help you according to your needs. With our expertise, your business can grow and scale up faster.
landing.about-subtitle: Established at September 2019, we began our business with Labor Supply and Manage Services. Now we are focusing on Network Infrastructure with more than 1,500 projects and striving to deliver the best services to our clients including CPE Assembly with more than 75,000 units and Manage Services in Contact Center and Sales.
service-about: I-Solution provides end to end solution in telecommunication industries to develop your network infrastructure.
We can provide various Manage Services such as Contact Center including manpower, premises, workstation, and application to support your business.
We offer a comprehensive range of products and services to fulfill the needs of Telecommunication & Multimedia.
With our expertise in Network Infrastructure we can provide Network Material and Equipment:
service-desc: Fiber optic network (FTTx) with various of services include Engineering & Construction (New Roll Out), Network Maintenance & Repair, and Home Connect (Residential and Multi Dwelling Unit).
Contact Center, Tele-sales, Direct Sales, Information Technology, and Other Key Function.
Customer Premise Equipment (CPE) such Set Top Box (STB), Cable Modem, Optical Network Terminal (ONT).
FTTx Poles, Passive Materials, Optical Distribution Network (ODN).

career.hero-subtitle: Join us & become part of the I-Teams
career.hero-desc: Share our voice and unique story together at I-Solution
career.about-desc: Through the spirit of collaboration and innovation, I-Solution provides opportunities for every employee to grow and develop, explore and learn new things at every step.
career.icci-title-header: Take a Peek into Our Culture
icci-desc: Prioritize professionalism, openness, responsibility and ethics as performance guidelines consistently.
Aligning diversity as a strength to achieve common goals.
Build and maintain relationships with customers and strive to understand their needs, and provide solutions that can meet customer expectations.
Courage to look for new, more efficient and more effective ways to achieve goals.
career.joinus-title-header-desc: For those of you who are looking for new career experiences, I-Solution provides 3 types of vacancies: Fresh Graduate, Professional and Internship.
career.joinus-freshgraduate-desc: For all of you vocational or senior high school graduate and bachelor's graduate diving into the career challenge, this is your moment!.
career.joinus-professional-desc: For those of you who already have experience in a certain field and want to develop yourself further. This one's for you.
career.joinus-internship-desc: For those of you who are high school/vocational, final year student, and college graduates. This internship program is totally vibes for you.
career.our-inside-desc: We have personal missions when we are alone, but when we are together at I-Solution, we try to unite what is our goal. Find out more about how we work and what we do at I-Solution.
career.testimonial-desc: At I-Solution I got the opportunity to hold design projects in employer branding, my skills also increased because I found various challenges to meet event and social media design needs. His older siblings are also always supportive and really accept input from interns.
